page.title: 15SILAGE MAKING _ WORLINGTON
page.content: When I wake up I hear dad's milking engine going .He begins milking our 40 Friesian Cows at 7. am .I help mum feed her calves by hand .While I am having breakfast mum feeds 2 cats and 2 dogs.They are always fed in the morning.After breakfast I go and find dad who is silage making.I ride on the tractor sometimes .Dad cut the grass for the silage yesterday with the help of a neighbour who came with a forage harvester.The neighbour picks the silage up with the forage harvester. Its then put into a trailer and taken to the silage pit where it it pushed up with a buck rake. Mum gets the tea for the men and we take it out to them.They go on until 9 p.m. Then I go indoors,watch T.V. and go to bed.
